titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Defense to submit to Congress a report evaluating beneficiary access to TRICARE network pharmacies.
To direct the Secretary of Defense to submit to Congress a report evaluating beneficiary access to TRICARE network pharmacies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of Defense to evaluate and report on beneficiary access to TRICARE network pharmacies under the TPharm5 contract (i.e., the current retail pharmacy network contract), including changes versus the TPharm4 contract.
